vendor_name: Sole d’oro Luxury Suites, Oia Santorini
title: Santorini Five-Star Oia Boutique Jacuzzi Suites with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description: Positioned on the impressive slopes of Santorini's Oia, overlooking the extraordinary blues of the shining Aegean Sea, Sole d’oro Luxury Suites offers guests the perfect base to soak up the island's incomparable magic. Across just 13 private suites - each dripping with iconic Cyclades style and boasting a luxurious private jacuzzi - the hotel provides guests easy access to Oia’s spellbinding collection of narrow streets, whitewashed houses and chapels from antiquity. Bask by the hotel’s magnificent pool or head to the onsite bar for champagne cocktails and views of the unrivalled sunset as it falls beneath the shimmering sea.
